# homes

**Instance Property**

An array of all homes managed by this home manager.

## Declaration

```swift
var homes: [HMHome] { get }
```

## Discussion

When you create a new home manager, its [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManager/homes] array is empty by default. You can only be sure that this array is properly initialized with data from the shared HomeKit database after the manager calls its delegate’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManagerDelegate/homeManagerDidUpdateHomes(_:)] method for the first time.

## Working with the home layout

- **HMHome**: The primary unit of living space, typically composed of rooms organized into zones.
